thread.title: Antonio De La Vega
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by Antonio De La Vega

author: Antonio De La Vega
title: Antonio De La Vega
text: My experience with your yacht Broker Mary Fluharty was by far the best service I have experienced. Customer service was at its finest and extremely detailed leaving the client with nothing to worry about. Mary is a gem for Pop Yachts and I would definitely do business with you again.
